name: Redboy
description:
Redboy is a 3D Platfomer where you attempt to escape the Underworld! Explore your way across 6 unique levels dealing with a wide variety of obstacles and traps to try.

How to Play

Move with WASD
Look with mouse
Press Space bar to jump

Developed by Boojy Studios

Itch.io - https://boojy-studios.itch.io/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/BoojyStudios

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCn8Yf7M05Hro71NwWtygBI
